item.title: UGC Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a video editor who can take raw footage and turn it into compelling 15-30 second video ads.

Must have a creative mind. I don't have time to sort through footage myself and need an editor that can take a look at the footage and create dynamic, concise, and attention grabbing content.

item.title: Creative Specialist for High-Quality Image and Video Ads for a dropshipping business - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
Our company is a dynamic and innovative dropshipping company. We are dedicated to create impactful and engaging content for our ads. We specialize in digital advertising and are looking for a highly skilled Creative Specialist to join our team. If you have a passion for creating high-quality images and videos and are adept at leveraging competitor research to craft compelling content, we want to hear from you!

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Creative Specialist to produce high-quality image ads and videos. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating 12 images or videos daily, ensuring that our content remains fresh, engaging, and effective. You will work closely with our team to discuss Facebook ad statistics, refine creative strategies, and continuously improve our content's performance.

Key Responsibilities:
Create High-Quality Ads: Design and produce 12 high-quality images or videos daily.
Creative Testing: Develop and test different hooks to determine the most effective creative strategies.
Competitor Research: Conduct competitor research and replicate successful video strategies.
Voice Over & Subtitles: Utilize ElevenLabs for voiceovers and add subtitles to videos.
Stock Footage Sourcing: Search for appropriate stock footage based on provided scripts.
Script-Based Video Creation: Create videos from provided scripts.
Weekly Communication: Collaborate with the team weekly to discuss Facebook ad performance and statistics.

Requirements:
Language Skills: Fluent in English, both written and spoken.
Technical Proficiency:
Strong familiarity with Slack for communication.
Proficient with Google Drive for file management.
Own video editing tools (knowledge of MidJourney is a plus).
Internet Connectivity: Reliable and fast internet connection.
Work Schedule: Available to work Monday to Saturday.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with ElevenLabs or similar voice-over tools.
Strong video editing skills with the ability to add subtitles and integrate stock footage seamlessly.
Excellent communication skills to effectively discuss ad performance and strategy.

Benefits:
Work remotely from the comfort of your home.
Collaborate with a dynamic and innovative team.
Opportunity to contribute to impactful and engaging content.
If you are a creative professional with a knack for crafting high-quality images and videos, and you thrive in a fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply. Join us in creating outstanding content that resonates with audiences and drives results.

How to Apply:
Please fill in this application form to move forward to the next step: forms.gle/rWbS2zZr6qyaTWqw5 and send in the chat a short motivation why you are the best candidate for this role.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing, Buyer Persona, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing, Buyer Persona, Social Media Marketing, Facebook
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Voiceover For German Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We have an English YouTube channel named "Towards Eternity".

And we post videos in different languages for our different channels by converting the eng video to different languages for our different channels. So, we need someone to VoiceOver our videos for our New Germany channel that we are starting. Our channel is an Islamic YouTube Channel so, you should be open to reading some words related to Islamic terminology.

Your pronunciation should be excellent.

You must be native.

You should be open to changing your voice for different tones.

Pricing will be decided mutually.
We are looking for male and female candidates. Attached is a text file for male and female separately.  Videos of the text files are also linked below. Using these, we expect you to prepare an example of 30-40 maximum 1 minute.

https://youtu.be/yXCMU72z0Ms?si=YPW-aroo_DbvF239  For men voice over.

https://youtu.be/CBLrlAD9uA8?si=GqaGsmFev-m7V8Q3  For women voice over.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Audio Editing
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Audio Editing
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
ob Proposal: Sports-Related YouTube Video Production
Proposal Overview
I am excited to propose a comprehensive plan for creating three high-quality YouTube videos per week, focusing on sports-related content. This proposal outlines my approach to content creation, the types of videos I will produce, and the value I can bring to your channel.

Objectives
Engage Audience: Create captivating content that resonates with sports enthusiasts.
Increase Subscribers: Attract new subscribers and retain existing ones.
Drive Engagement: Foster a community of active viewers who like, comment, and share the videos.
Content Strategy
Video Types:

Game Analysis: In-depth analysis of recent games, including key plays, player performances, and strategic insights.
Player Profiles: Highlighting the careers and achievements of notable athletes, including interviews and personal stories.
Sports News: Weekly round-ups of major sports events, breaking news, and upcoming matches.
Video Length:

Short Videos (5-7 minutes): Quick updates and highlights.
Medium-Length Videos (10-15 minutes): In-depth analysis and player profiles.
Long-Form Content (20+ minutes): Detailed breakdowns and discussions.
Content Calendar:

Monday: Game Analysis
Wednesday: Player Profiles
Friday: Sports News Round-Up
Production Plan
Pre-Production:

Research: Conduct thorough research on the latest sports news, games, and player statistics.
Scripting: Write detailed scripts to ensure clear and engaging narration.

Then create clips and make the videos

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:46 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Action, Gameplay Footage, Concept Video, Cinematic Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Action, Gameplay Footage, Concept Video, Cinematic Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Strong Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Info:
We are looking to hire a skilled video editor to create exciting and engaging final videos from refined footage of our recent paving jobs at three different locations. The goal is to produce content that follows best practices for Instagram Reels and maximizes the chances of the clips going viral.

Here are the details:

Project: Create final videos from refined footage of three paving jobs. The footage for each job is clearly labelled as intro/outtro, along with the different stages of work captured in each clip. Stage 1= first stage, and the stage with the highest number is the last stage.

Objective: Make the content exciting and engaging, following best practices for IG Reels.

Length: Each reel should be approx 1 minute.

Requirements:
Use the provided footage to create a captivating video.
Ensure the video is optimized for IG Reels.
Highlight key moments of the paving jobs. Make it engaging and fun!

We are testing the skills of 3 different video editors- and will be going with the best one. One individual will receive an ongoing contract with us, as we always have new footage which requires editing.

Here are links to the refined footage:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HuxyGonpo7rTxo1RWI3_rE2xjQ0ViIl0?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13Ij7n6TBB3qxHArpSDyR2UexOaJasCbN?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MgMCSsPC127Xv5rCWiENeM0c6Rzr7HFY?usp=drive_link

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, 360-Degree Video Editing, Dynamic Transition, Color Grading, Visual Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, 360-Degree Video Editing, Dynamic Transition, Color Grading, Visual Effects, Video Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Persian content creators wanted for short language videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for Persian speaking actors who can film and edit their own content. The videos will be very simple and used to help people who want to learn Persian.

Please Only Apply If you
- You are a native Persian speaker
- You can film and edit your own high-quality videos

Content Details
- 50 short Persian phrases - Standing speaking directly to camera.
- Video length 3- 5 seconds

- 15 scripted videos - acting out a short scenario while speaking Persian.
- Video length 30 seconds

Examples for each type of video will be sent to you alone with filming guidelines.

Dates/Deadline
Filming to start end of May/early June. Further detail will be provided if you are successful.

If you are interested, please send a demo video of you introducing yourself in Persian (facing the camera directly, please show your personality)






Budget: $160
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:37 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Hebrew, Content Creation, Video Editing
Skills: Acting, Hebrew, Content Creation, Video Editing

item.title: Skilled Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for another remote video editor to join our team!

We currently have 2 full-time editors who are doing amazing work for us but they are getting bogged down with the amount of videos we need to produce at any given time - time to expand the team!

They currently use Adobe Premiere Pro and we would prefer to keep this consistent for collaboration purposes. If you prefer another tool, we can talk.

Who We Need:
- AVAILABILITY -- We're looking to bring on someone who has plenty of room in their day-to-day work to take on extra projects. If you're already pretty full with work, this is NOT the opportunity for you.
- SPEED -- Speed is crucial. We are aiming to launch new Meta and YouTube Ads weekly and that's not counting the organic video content we produce on a regular basis too. That said, turnaround time is very important to us. We need someone who can knock out 3-15 minute polished videos in just 1-2 days.
- COMMUNICATION -- This person needs to be a great communicator; someone who isn't afraid of messaging us if they have questions or need additional resources.

Our Business:
- We are Pioneering Clean (check us out at https://pioneeringclean.com/)
- We've already established a pretty good system using tools like Frame.io, Asana, and Slack but always looking for ways to improve and value our teams feedback.
- You won't need to "hold our hands" like with other clients. We provide high quality video, audio, storyboards, b-roll footage, and more to give our editors everything they need to produce high-quality work.
- We specialize in the cleaning industry and produce ads and content around this topic. If you find this field boring, please do not apply!

Skills Required:
- Video Editing (Premiere Pro)
- Audio Optimization
- Custom Motion Graphics
- Graphic Design

Summary & Additional Notes:
- If you have an amazing work ethic and great video editing skills, let's chat!
- Only custom, personalized proposals please... Any 'copy & paste' proposals will be IGNORED! We care about our team members and want our team to care about us and our business.
- In fact, to show that you're reading all of this, please include the word 'Pioneer' somewhere in your proposal ;)
- Communication is key. Tons of revisions are not good! We expect 1-3 but more revisions than that really delays the process. Therefore, it's important to ask questions along the way if needed.
- SPEED is essential! If you love editing but it takes you several days to produce a 3-5 minute video, this may not be the position for you (yet). That said, the 2 editors we have now both started out at an intermediate level and we now consider them expert editors - they grew into the position and we are happy to support anyone else who can do the same!!

In short, if you LOVE video editing and want to be a part of a growing organization, then we encourage you to submit a personalized proposal.

We're thinking that one more team member would suffice but are not opposed to hiring 2-3 total so please don't shy away from submitting your proposal. If the post is still published then we're still hiring! The second we fill these spots, we will take down the job post.

Thank you for your time and attention - we look forward to your proposals :)

Dalton O.
Co-founder, Pioneering Clean
https://www.youtube.com/@pioneeringclean


Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

- Graphic Design

Summary & Additional Notes:
- If you have an amazing work ethic and great video editing skills, let's chat!
- Only custom, personalized proposals please... Any 'copy & paste' proposals will be IGNORED! We care about our team members and want our team to care about us and our business.
- In fact, to show that you're reading all of this, please include the word 'Pioneer' somewhere in your proposal ;)
- Communication is key. Tons of revisions are not good! We expect 1-3 but more revisions than that really delays the process. Therefore, it's important to ask questions along the way if needed.
- SPEED is essential! If you love editing but it takes you several days to produce a 3-5 minute video, this may not be the position for you (yet). That said, the 2 editors we have now both started out at an intermediate level and we now consider them expert editors - they grew into the position and we are happy to support anyone else who can do the same!!

In short, if you LOVE video editing and want to be a part of a growing organization, then we encourage you to submit a personalized proposal.

We're thinking that one more team member would suffice but are not opposed to hiring 2-3 total so please don't shy away from submitting your proposal. If the post is still published then we're still hiring! The second we fill these spots, we will take down the job post.

Thank you for your time and attention - we look forward to your proposals :)

Dalton O.
Co-founder, Pioneering Clean
https://www.youtube.com/@pioneeringclean


Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Audio Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Podcast Production Assistant Needed for Dynamic Podcast! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about podcasts and have a knack for production?

We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Podcast Production Assistant to join our team. If you love bringing creative projects to life and ensuring everything runs smoothly, this role is for you!

Responsibilities:

Stitch the intro to the main recording for each episode
Schedule and upload episodes to YouTube
Create promotional materials for social media
Maintain and update our podcast spreadsheet
Ensure all production tasks are organized and deadlines are met

Requirements:

Experience with podcast production
Proficiency with audio editing software (e.g., Audacity, Adobe Audition)
Familiarity with YouTube and social media platforms
Strong organizational and multitasking skills
Attention to detail and a proactive approach
Excellent communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with video editing
Knowledge of SEO and online marketing strategies
Previous experience managing a content calendar

To Apply:

Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience, and any examples of past podcast production work. We look forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Social Media Management, Content Creation, SEO Keyword Research, Social Media Design, Social Posts, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Podcast, Podcast Production
Skills: Social Media Management, Content Creation, SEO Keyword Research, Social Media Design, Social Posts, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Podcast, Podcast Production
Country: United States

item.title: USA🇺🇸 Content Creators Needed! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there, amazing Content Creators!😊

We hope you're doing well! We are ContentJet🚀, a UGC Digital Marketing company and we are looking for creator prospects from USA or Canada for our client super.com!!

To be considered, you need to be located in one of these cities!!

-San Antonio
-Phoenix

-Ages: 20-40yo

-Gender: Female & Male Creators

-Budget per video: 60 USD

-Directions will be provided❗❗

Nature of the video: RAW, no editing needed.

Willing to visit destinations in their cities to film the ads in (they would be compensated for the video:  $60 USD but also be compensated for the destination cost: ie: amusement park, hotel, zoo, etc...wherever the script takes them that the client is requesting, still in their city.)


They will be provided a script and direction for any videos they create for this client.

This will not just be a one video project. If the client chooses you, you will get opportunities as they are requested by the client (we have an ongoing partnership with the client)


Website: https://www.super.com/

Language: EN

Duration of videos: UNDER 25 seconds


If you're interested, please, send your UGC portfolio or 2-3 videos of your previous UGC work (talking to the camera) so we can see your camera presence!😍 Also, send the address to which we'll be sending the product!

Looking forward to starting collaborating with you!🚀

Thank you!😊
ContentJet.io

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:23 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Romanian, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Romanian, Content Writing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: USA🇺🇸 or Canada🇨🇦 Content Creators Needed! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there, amazing Content Creators!😊

We hope you're doing well! We are ContentJet🚀, a UGC Digital Marketing company and we are looking for creator prospects from USA or Canada for our client Push!!

-Ages: 21-30yo

-Gender: Female Creators

-Budget per video: 50 USD

-Directions will be provided❗❗

Nature of the video: RAW, no editing needed.

We need a creator that:

has a treadmill at home (no walking pad) or can visit a gym to run on a treadmill.
is fit / has experience with running on a treadmill (not just jogging but running on higher speed and elevation and some knowledge on how to properly run; posture etc. - this is very important for the visual appeal

Example video:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bgOruPO3osLLnTF0UsfFJ--9DJUNjBmI/view
Creative direction

Push Training

An app that creates custom treadmill running workouts for users
link for the app: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/treadmill-workout-pushtraining/id6450863808 The app offers a free trial, feel free to start it and cancel immediately.

SCRIPT

(Creator is hyping themselves up as seen in this Video 1 +Vo)
I switched to Push Training for personalized treadmill workouts, and the results are incredible.
(Creator running on a treadmill on a higher speed + Vo) I've been hitting new personal records.

(Creator starting their run on a treadmill, close-up shot to adjusting speed and incline on the treadmill + Vo) My stamina has skyrocketed.

(Show a close-up of a phone screen with the Push Training app open, displaying a customized workout: 30 minutes long. Make sure the screen is visible and we can see the workouts and which one you choose + Vo) With just 30 minutes per session,

(Creator running on a treadmill on a higher speed + Vo) I'm running longer distances

(The creator finishes their run, looking satisfied, and shows the app screen with their progress + Vo) and my pace is faster than ever.

(Show creator ending their workout and stretching. Giving a thumbs up and smiling, with the Push Training app screen visible + Vo) Push Training customizes workouts to my fitness level, making each session effective and challenging. I've never felt more motivated or seen such improvements in my performance. If you want to take your treadmill workouts to the next level, Push Training is the way to go.

If you're interested, please, send your UGC portfolio or 2-3 videos of your previous UGC work (talking to the camera) so we can see your camera presence!😍 Also, send the address to which we'll be sending the product!

Looking forward to starting collaborating with you!🚀

Thank you!😊
ContentJet.io

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:16 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Romanian, Content Writing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Romanian, Content Writing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Instagram Reel Ad Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Key Responsibilities:

Edit three Instagram and Facebook ad reels to ensure a large outreach and impactful message delivery.
Incorporate visuals, pop-up text, and images to emphasize the message and highlight the benefits of choosing Cunningham Marketing for social media marketing.
Ensure the style of the edited reels aligns with a provided reference, maintaining consistency and brand identity.
Create a compelling visual hook at the beginning of each reel to capture and retain the attention of the target audience.
Collaborate closely with the Cunningham Marketing team to understand the objectives and key messages of the ad reels.
Apply creative and technical skills to enhance the overall quality and effectiveness of the ad reels.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically for social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Strong understanding of social media trends, particularly in the tourism industry.
Ability to create visually appealing and engaging content that resonates with the target audience.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.
A portfolio showcasing previous work, especially examples of social media ad reels.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working with tourism enterprises or similar industries.
Knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in social media advertising.
Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and suggest innovative ideas.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, CapCut, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, CapCut, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production
Country: United States
click to apply
